examples: Most children enjoy singing.
Her singing was legendary.
Do you hear the birds singing?
They recorded her singing.
The singing was loud and clear.
He was singing to himself quietly.
Her mother was singing lustily.
A kettle was singing on the stove.
Her singing was cold and mechanical.
Her singing voice is truly exquisite.
He wanted to try his hand at singing.
She was singing while she was cooking.
I could hear the birds singing outside my window.
He entered the Royal College of Music to study singing.
The music teacher was enthralled with the child's singing.
I knew she was happy again when I heard her singing away in the kitchen.
Her singing was atrocious.
The nightingale was singing.
Smith's signature singing style
Her singing makes my skin crawl.
a singing career on the downgrade
She has a unique style of singing.
She has a very sweet singing voice.
You're singing a different tune now!
Someone upstairs was singing off-key.
birds singing from the branches of a tree
Mrs Edwards was singing your praises today.
Sue was singing away to herself in the bath.
He eked a living by singing on street corners.
We would hear the birds singing all around us.
example_translate: Её пение было холодным и механическим.
Он захотел попробовать свои силы в пении.
Я слышал, как за окном поют птицы.
Он поступил в Королевский Музыкальный колледж, чтобы учиться пению.
Я понял, что она снова счастлива, когда услышал, как она всё время поёт на кухне.
От её пения у меня мурашки по коже.
птицы, которые поют на ветвях дерева
Миссис Эдвардс сегодня пела тебе дифирамбы.
Сью напевала про себя в ванной.
Он перебивался тем, что пел на перекрёстках.
Мы слышали бы, как вокруг поют птицы.
